Article/0-0-0-18/context-project.title: Context Project
Article/0-0-0-18/context-project.html:
• Type: object<\/code><\/li>
  • Origin: Nullstack Context<\/a><\/li>
  • Availability: server/client<\/li>
  • readwrite<\/strong> in the server<\/strong> context<\/li>
  • readonly<\/strong> in the client<\/strong> context<\/li> <\/ul>

    It gives you information about the app manifest and some metatags.<\/p>

    project<\/code> keys will be used to generate metatags during server-side rendering and must be assigned before initiate<\/code><\/a> is resolved.<\/p>

    project<\/code> keys will be used to generate the app manifest<\/strong>.<\/p>

    The disallow<\/code> key will be used to generate the robots.txt<\/strong>.<\/p>

    The following keys are available in the object and supported as environment variables as follows:<\/p>

    • domain<\/strong>: string<\/code> (NULLSTACK_PROJECT_DOMAIN<\/code>)<\/li>
    • name<\/strong>: string<\/code> (NULLSTACK_PROJECT_NAME<\/code>)<\/li>
    • shortName<\/strong>: string<\/code> (NULLSTACK_PROJECT_SHORT_NAME<\/code>)<\/li>
    • color<\/strong>: string<\/code> (NULLSTACK_PROJECT_COLOR<\/code>)<\/li>
    • backgroundColor<\/strong>: string<\/code><\/li>
    • type<\/strong>: string<\/code><\/li>
    • display<\/strong>: string<\/code><\/li>
    • orientation<\/strong>: string<\/code><\/li>
    • scope<\/strong>: string<\/code><\/li>
    • root<\/strong>: string<\/code><\/li>
    • icons<\/strong>: object<\/code><\/li>
    • favicon<\/strong>: string<\/code> (relative or absolute url)<\/li>
    • disallow<\/strong>: string array<\/code> (relative paths)<\/li>
    • sitemap<\/strong>: boolean<\/code> or string<\/code> (relative or absolute url)<\/li>
    • cdn<\/strong>: string<\/code> (NULLSTACK_PROJECT_CDN<\/code>)<\/li>
    • protocol<\/strong>: string<\/code> (NULLSTACK_PROJECT_PROTOCOL<\/code>)<\/li> <\/ul>

      Besides domain<\/code>, name<\/code> and color<\/code> all other keys have sensible defaults generated based on the application scope.<\/p>

      If you do not declare the icons<\/code> key, Nullstack will scan any icons with the name following the pattern "icon-[WIDTH]x[HEIGHT].png" in your public<\/strong> folder.<\/p>

      The head<\/code> meta tag apple-touch-icon<\/code> will be set to your icon-180x180.png<\/code> file.<\/p>

      If the sitemap<\/code> key is set to true your robots.txt<\/strong> file will point the sitemap to https://${project.domain}/sitemap.xml<\/code>.<\/p>

      The cdn<\/code> key will prefix your asset bundles and will be available in the context so you can manually prefix other assets.<\/p>

      The protocol<\/code> key is "http" in development mode and "https" in production mode by default.<\/p> 

      // server.js<\/span>
import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>
import<\/span> Application from<\/span> './src/Application'<\/span>;<\/span>

const<\/span> context =<\/span> Nullstack.<\/span>start<\/span>(<\/span>Application)<\/span>;<\/span>

context.<\/span>start<\/span> =<\/span> function<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
  const<\/span> {<\/span> project }<\/span> =<\/span> context;<\/span>
  project.<\/span>name =<\/span> 'Nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>
  project.<\/span>shortName =<\/span> 'Nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>
  project.<\/span>domain =<\/span> 'nullstack.app'<\/span>;<\/span>
  project.<\/span>color =<\/span> '#d22365'<\/span>;<\/span>
  project.<\/span>backgroundColor =<\/span> '#d22365'<\/span>;<\/span>
  project.<\/span>type =<\/span> 'website'<\/span>;<\/span>
  project.<\/span>display =<\/span> 'standalone'<\/span>;<\/span>
  project.<\/span>orientation =<\/span> 'portrait'<\/span>;<\/span>
  project.<\/span>scope =<\/span> '/'<\/span>;<\/span>
  project.<\/span>root =<\/span> '/'<\/span>;<\/span>
  project.<\/span>icons =<\/span> {<\/span>
    '72'<\/span>:<\/span> '/icon-72x72.png'<\/span>,<\/span>
    '128'<\/span>:<\/span> '/icon-128x128.png'<\/span>,<\/span>
    '512'<\/span>:<\/span> '/icon-512x512.png'<\/span>
  }<\/span>;<\/span>
  project.<\/span>favicon =<\/span> '/favicon.png'<\/span>;<\/span>
  project.<\/span>disallow =<\/span> [<\/span>'/admin'<\/span>]<\/span>;<\/span>
  project.<\/span>sitemap =<\/span> true<\/span>;<\/span>
  project.<\/span>cdn =<\/span> 'cdn.nullstack.app'<\/span>;<\/span>
  project.<\/span>protocol =<\/span> 'https'<\/span>;<\/span>
}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> context;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>

      

      More about the context.start<\/code> at application startup<\/a><\/p>
<\/blockquote>

      // src/Application.njs<\/span>
import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> Application<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>

  prepare<\/span>(<\/span>{<\/span>project,<\/span> page}<\/span><\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    page.<\/span>title =<\/span> project.<\/span>name;<\/span>
  }<\/span>

}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Application;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>

      

      ð¡ You can override the automatically generated manifest.json<\/strong> and robots.txt<\/strong> by serving your own file from the public<\/strong> folder<\/p>
<\/blockquote>
Article/0-0-0-18/context-project.description: The project object is a proxy in the Nullstack Context available in both client and server and gives you information about the app manifest and some metatags

page.title: Context Project - Nullstack
page.description: The project object is a proxy in the Nullstack Context available in both client and server and gives you information about the app manifest and some metatags
